com.github.errantlinguist.latticevisualiser
Class ArgParser

java.lang.Object
  com.github.errantlinguist.latticevisualiser.ArgParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Settings, SysExits
public class ArgParser
extends Object
implements Settings, SysExits

A POSIX-compliant command-line argument parser using the Apache Commons CLI library.

Since:
2011-11-12
Version:
2011-11-12
Author:
Todd Shore

OPTION_PARSER

private static final org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser OPTION_PARSER
The CommandLineParser used for parsing commands — In this case, it is a PosixParser.

OPTIONS

private static final org.apache.commons.cli.Options OPTIONS
The Options to parse.

nonwordsInfile

private File nonwordsInfile
The File representing non-word labels.

latticeInfile

private File latticeInfile
The input File to read which represents the word/phone lattice to visualise.

minStateSize

private int minStateSize
The minimum size of a state/vertex, to avoid them being too small to see on-screen.

stateSizeMultiplier

private double stateSizeMultiplier
The state/vertex size multiplier to use to scale their size based on the number of incoming/outgoing edges they have.

windowDimension

private Dimension windowDimension
The Dimension to be used for creating the main window.

getInstance

public static ArgParser getInstance()
Returns:
A single static ArgParser instance.

getMainClassName

private static final String getMainClassName()
Gets the name of the class of which the main method was called; This is not necessarily main(String[]) (which is what creates this method useful). NOTE: Might be inaccurate if used in a multi-threaded application, because it gets the head of the stack of only the thread in which the method was called.

Returns:
The name of the class of which the main method was called.

notifyBadArgs

protected static void notifyBadArgs()
Writes a usage message to the standard error output and exits the program with the error code SysExits.EX_USAGE.

parseDimensionArgs

private static Dimension parseDimensionArgs(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cl)
Parses command-line arguments for window width and height.

Parameters:
cl - The CommandLine representing the command-line arguments.
Returns:
A Dimension object used for defining the dimensions of the main window for visualisation.

Returns:
The File representing non-word labels.

getStateSizeMultiplier

public double getStateSizeMultiplier()
Returns:
The state/vertex size multiplier to use to scale their size based on the number of incoming/outgoing edges they have.

The Dimension to be used for creating the main window.

parseArgs

public void parseArgs(String[] args)
Parameters:
args - The command-line arguments.
Throws:
IOException - If the given input path for a non-word label file does not refer to a valid file or another I/O error occurs.
ParseException - If there is an error parsing the contents of a given input non-word label file path.
